     <div class="container">
      <div class="v9-story">
       <div class="v9-story__col v9-story__col--primary">
        <div class="v9-story__media-primary">
         <figure class="v9-story__figure">
          <img alt="Portrait of Brian Rosenbaum, against a yellow background, wearing a purple and white checked shirt." src="https://d3n8a8pro7vhmx.cloudfront.net/3dna/pages/46075/attachments/original/1598287496/v9-action-primary_opt.jpg?1598287496"/>
          <figcaption class="v9-story__figcaption v9-color-purple-deep">
           <b>
            Brian Rosenbaum
           </b>
           formerly served as the board president of the volunteer-run
           <b>
            Young Nonprofit Professionals Network Los Angeles
           </b>
           , where he hosted mixers and workshops, and supported members in their professional development using NationBuilder.
          </figcaption>
         </figure>
        </div>
        <div class="v9-story__copy">
         <!-- _v9_text_group.html -->
         <div class="v9-text-group">
          <span class="v9-text-group__eyebrow">
           Move people to action
          </span>
          <h2 class="v9-text-group__headline v9-color-salmon">
           Meet supporters where they are and guide them to the next step
          </h2>
          <p class="v9-text-group__body">
           Launch action pages in minutes with readymade templates for petitions, volunteers, events, donations, and more. Give supporters, donors, and volunteers seamless ways to engage with clear calls to action and social prompts throughout your site.
          </p>
         </div>
         <!-- /_v9_text_group.html -->
        </div>
       </div>

         <b>
          Brian Rosenbaum
         </b>
         formerly served as the board president of the volunteer-run
         <b>
          Young Nonprofit Professionals Network Los Angeles
         </b>
         , where he hosted mixers and workshops, and supported members in their professional development using NationBuilder.

0-.6.037-.88.11-.28.073-.533.21-.76.41a2.018 2.018 0 0 0-.7 1.54v6.04h-2.8V31.45zm8.38 0h2.72v1.44c.413-.613.903-1.06 1.47-1.34a3.948 3.948 0 0 1 1.77-.42c1.187 0 2.067.31 2.64.93.573.62.86 1.597.86 11.1c.053.267.13.48.23.64.1.16.233.287.4.38.167.093.367.157.6.19.233.033.517.05.85.05.52 0 .927-.097 1.22-.29.293-.193.51-.45.65-.77s.227-.687.26-1.1c.033-.413.05-.84.05-1.28v-.32a3.35 3.35 0 0 1-1.33 1.15c-.54.26-1.15.39-1.83.39-1.467 0-2.563-.473-3.29-1.42-.727-.947-1.09-2.22-1.09-3.82 0-.76.103-1.46.31-2.1.207-.64.503-1.19.89-1.65.387-.46.863-.82 1.43-1.08.567-.26 1.203-.39 1.91-.39.56 0 1.103.107 1.63.32.527.213 1.01.607 1.45 1.18v-1.18h2.72v8.98c0 .88-.09 1.663-.27 2.35-.18.687-.467 1.27-.86 1.75-.393.48-.907.843-1.54 1.09-.633.247-1.403.37-2.31.37-.84 0-1.557-.07-2.15-.21-.593-.14-1.083-.353-1.47-.64a2.855 2.855 0 0 1-.89-1.08 4.772 4.772 0 0 1-.41-1.51h2.84zm4.28-6.24c0-.627-.07-1.133-.21-1.52-.14-.387-.323-.683-.55-.89a1.7 1.7 0 0 0-.76-.41c-.28-.067-.56-.1-.84-.1-.307 0-.597.053-.87.16-.273.107-.513.28-.72.52a2.62 2.62 0 0 0-.49.92c-.12.373-.18.82-.18 1.34 0 1.107.21 1.89.63 2.35.42.46.943.69 1.57.69.347 0 .67-.05.97-.15.3-.1.557-.26.77-.48.213-.22.38-.507.5-.86s.18-.783.18-1.29v-.28zm7.28 2.26c.093.613.34 1.013.74 1.2.4.187.88.28 1.44.28.667 0 1.143-.083 1.43-.25.287-.167.43-.437.43-.81 0-.267-.09-.5-.27-.7-.18-.2-.523-.34-1.03-.42l-1.44-.24c-1.267-.2-2.21-.543-2.83-1.03-.62-.487-.93-1.223-.93-2.21 0-.507.11-.96.33-1.36.22-.4.53-.74.93-1.02s.877-.497 1.43-.65a6.841 6.841 0 0 1 1.83-.23c.827 0 1.52.083 2.08.25.56.167 1.017.39 1.37.67.353.28.62.613.8 1 .18.387.31.8.39 1.24l-2.5.32c-.12-.48-.33-.833-.63-1.06-.3-.227-.783-.34-1.45-.34-.373 0-.683.03-.93.09a1.84 1.84 0 0 0-.58.23c-.14.093-.24.2-.3.32a.763.763 0 0 0-.09.34c0 .333.103.577.31.73.207.153.61.283 1.21.39l1.32.22c.733.12 1.34.273 1.82.46s.863.417 1.15.69c.287.273.487.597.6.97.113.373.17.807.17 1.3 0 .987-.373 1.777-1.12 2.37-.747.593-1.9.89-3.46.89a9.113 9.113 0 0 1-1.79-.17 4.492 4.492 0 0 1-1.52-.59 3.4 3.4 0 0 1-1.1-1.12c-.287-.467-.45-1.053-.49-1.76h2.68z" fill="#8C9D26">
              </path>
             </g>
            </g>
           </g>
          </svg>
          <img alt="In this animation, you see a supporter who is signing up to volunteer. As he does, he specifies what role he is able to contribute as a volunteer and when he is available." src="https://d3n8a8pro7vhmx.cloudfront.net/3dna/pages/46075/attachments/original/1598287498/volunteer-management-animate_2x_opt.png?1598287498"/>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>

    <script src="https://3dna.nationbuilder.com/themes/24/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/0/attachments/14955746291615999939/default/objectfitpolyfill.js">
    </script>
    <script src="https://3dna.nationbuilder.com/themes/24/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/0/attachments/14955746291615999939/default/anime.js">
    </script>
    <script src="https://3dna.nationbuilder.com/themes/24/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/0/attachments/14955746291615999939/default/inview.js">
    </script>
    <script src="https://3dna.nationbuilder.com/themes/24/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/0/attachments/14955746291615999939/default/tabs.js">
    </script>
    <script>
     var tabsOne = new NBTabs('[data-nb-tabs-one]');
  var tabsTwo = new NBTabs('[data-nb-tabs-two]');

  var supporterAnimation = anime({
    targets: '[data-animate="supporter"] .v9-animate-el',
    translateY: [20, 0],
    scale: [.5, 1],
    opacity: [0, 1],
    duration: 1000,
    delay: anime.stagger(250),
    autoplay: false
  });

  var smartFieldsAnimation = anime.timeline({
    autoplay: false
  });

  var smartFieldElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-animate="smart-fields"] .v9-animate-el');

  smartFieldsAnimation
    .add({
      targets: smartFieldElements[2],
      scale: [1, 0],
      opacity: [1, 0],
      duration: 2000,
      delay: 1000
    })
    .add({
      targets: smartFieldElements[1],
      scale: [1, 0],
      opacity: [1, 0],
      duration: 2000
    }, '-=1500')
    .add({
      targets: smartFieldElements[0],
      scale: [1, 0],
      opacity: [1, 0],
      duration: 2000
    }, '-=1500');

  var segmentationAnimation = anime.timeline({
    autoplay: false
  });

  segmentationAnimation
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="segmentation"] .v9-animate-line',
      strokeDashoffset: [anime.setDashoffset, 0],
      easing: 'easeInOutSine',
      duration: 750
    })
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="segmentation"] .v9-animate-el',
      translateY: [20, 0],
      opacity: [0, 1],
      delay: anime.stagger(400)
    }, '-=500');

  var automationEmailSeriesAnimation = anime({
    targets: '[data-animate="automation-email-series"] .v9-animate-line',
    strokeDashoffset: [anime.setDashoffset, 0],
    easing: 'easeInOutSine',
    duration: 1000
  })

  var volunteerManagementAnimation = anime.timeline({
    autoplay: false
  });

  volunteerManagementAnimation
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="volunteer-management"] .v9-animate-line',
      strokeDashoffset: [anime.setDashoffset, 0],
      easing: 'easeInOutSine',
      duration: 1000
    })
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="volunteer-management"] .v9-animate-el',
      translateX: [20, 0],
      opacity: [0, 1],
      delay: anime.stagger(300)
    }, '-=500');

  var recruiterTrackingAnimation = anime.timeline({
    autoplay: false
  });

  recruiterTrackingAnimation
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="recruiter-tracking"] .v9-animate-line',
      strokeDashoffset: [anime.setDashoffset, 0],
      easing: 'easeInOutSine',
      duration: 1000
    })
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="recruiter-tracking"] .v9-animate-el',
      scale: [.5, 1],
      opacity: [0, 1],
      delay: anime.stagger(300)
    }, '-=500');

  var permissionSetsAnimation = anime.timeline({
    autoplay: false
  });

  permissionSetsAnimation
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="permission-sets"] .v9-animate-el',
      translateY: [-500, 155],
      easing: 'easeOutSine',
      duration: 2000
    })
    .add({
      targets: '[data-animate="permission-sets"] .v9-animate-checkmark',
      opacity: [0, 1],
      delay: anime.stagger(300)
    });

  inView.threshold(.75);

  inView('[data-animate="supporter"]')
    .once('enter', function() {
      supporterAnimation.play();
    });

  inView('[data-animate="smart-fields"]')
    .once('enter', function() {
        smartFieldsAnimation.play();
    });

  inView('[data-animate="permission-sets"]')
    .once('enter', function() {
      permissionSetsAnimation.play();
    });

  if (window.matchMedia('(max-width: 992px)').matches) {
    inView('[data-animate="segmentation"]')
      .once('enter', function() {
          segmentationAnimation.play();
      });

    inView('[data-animate="automation-email-series"]')
      .once('enter', function() {
          automationEmailSeriesAnimation.play();
      });

    inView('[data-animate="recruiter-tracking"]')
      .once('enter', function() {
          recruiterTrackingAnimation.play();
      });

    inView('[data-animate="volunteer-management"]')
      .once('enter', function() {
          volunteerManagementAnimation.play();
      });
  }

  document.addEventListener('tabbed', function(event) {
    var panelId = event.detail.content.getAttribute('id');
    switch(panelId) {
      case 'panel-smart-fields':
        smartFieldsAnimation.play();
        break;
      case 'panel-segmentation':
        segmentationAnimation.play();
        break;
      case 'panel-automation-email-series':
        automationEmailSeriesAnimation.play();
        break;
      case 'panel-permission-sets':
        permissionSetsAnimation.play();
        break;
      case 'panel-recruiter-tracking':
        recruiterTrackingAnimation.play();
        break;
      case 'panel-volunteer-management':
        volunteerManagementAnimation.play();
        break;
    }
  }, false);
    </script>
    <!-- Icons created by Fabio Nucatolo from Noun Project -->
   </div>
   <!-- /content-* -->
   <!-- /_columns_1.html -->
   <div id="fb-root">
   </div>
   <script data-cookieconsent="marketing" type="text/plain">
    window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
    FB.init({
      appId      : 126739610711965,
      channelUrl : "//3dna.nationbuilder.com/channel.html",
      status     : true,
      version    : "v3.2",
      cookie     : true,
      xfbml      : true
    });
  };
  (function(d, s, id) {
    var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
    if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
    js = d.createElement(s);
    js.id = id;
    js.async = true;
    js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
    fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
  }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
   </script>
   <script src="https://d3n8a8pro7vhmx.cloudfront.net/assets/liquid-004c65a942f8804fb75f8613bf1dea7e8bf2e9e00227caa99c2b4c576751a3a8.js">
   </script>
   <script data-turbolinks-track="reload" src="https://d3n8a8pro7vhmx.cloudfront.net/assets/tinymce-0015c5b41a2ac22883833accf1e65adc711250af40cc196c75fe181d0f1359fa.js">
   </script>
   <script>
    //<![CDATA[
TinyMCERails.configuration.default = {
  selector: "textarea.tinymce",
  toolbar_items_size: "small",
  branding: false,
  menubar: false,
  fix_list_elements: true,
  forced_root_block: "p",
  convert_urls: false,
  relative_urls: false,
  browser_spellcheck: true,
  block_formats: "Normal=p;Heading 1=h1;Heading 2=h2;Heading 3=h3;Heading 4=h4;Heading 5=h5;Block Quote=blockquote;Code=code;Code Sample=samp",
  valid_elements: "@[id|align|class|style|title|dir\u003cltr?rtl|lang|xml::lang],a[rel|rev|charset|hreflang|tabindex|accesskey|type|name|href|target|title|class|download],abbr,acronym,address,area[shape|coords|href|alt|target],bdo,big,br,button,caption,cite,col[align|char|charoff|span|valign|width],colgroup[align|char|charoff|span|valign|width],dd,del[datetime|cite],div,div[data-ajax],dl,dt,em/i,figcaption,figure,hr[size|noshade],img[longdesc|usemap|src|border|alt=|title|hspace|vspace|width|height|align],ins[datetime|cite],kbd,label[for],legend,map[name],mark,noscript,q[cite],samp,small,span,strike,strong/b,tbody,tfoot,thead,tt,u,var,#p,#td[colspan|rowspan|width|height|align|valign|bgcolor|background|bordercolor|scope],#th[colspan|rowspan|width|height|align|valign|scope],-blockquote,-code,-font[face|size|color],-h1,-h2,-h3,-h4,-h5,-h6,-li,-ol[type|compact],-pre,-span,-sub,-sup,-table[border|cellspacing|cellpadding|width|frame|rules|height|align|summary|bgcolor|background|bordercolor],-tr[rowspan|width|height|align|valign|bgcolor|background|bordercolor],-ul[type|compact]"

      border-bottom: 1px solid #555B5E;

    margin-top: 0;
  }

    background: #000;

   <footer>
    <div class="container">
     <div class="row footer-primary-nav">
      <div class="col-md-5 col-sm-12 col-md-push-7 signin footer-primary-nav-align">
       <a href="/login">
        Sign in to NationBuilder.com
       </a>
       <div class="footer-line-space">
       </div>
       <a href="/nation_login">
        Sign in to your nation
       </a>
      </div>
      <div class="col-md-7 col-sm-12 col-md-pull-5 footer-primary-nav-align">
       <ul>
        <li>
         <a href="/demos">
          Live demos
         </a>

   </footer>
   <script>
    function resize() {
  if ($(window).width() < 768) {
   $('footer .footer-links ul').addClass('minimize');
   $('footer .footer-links h4').addClass('h4-accordion');
   $('footer .footer-links h4 a').on("click", function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
   });
  } else {
    $('footer .footer-links ul').removeClass('minimize');
    $('footer .footer-links h4').removeClass('h4-accordion');
  }
}

$(document).ready( function() {
    $(window).resize(resize);
    resize();

    $('footer .footer-links h4').click(function() {
      var $ul = $(this).parent().find('ul.minimize');
      // $ul.toggleClass('display-block')
      $ul.toggleClass('expandit');
    });
});
   </script>
   <!-- /_footer.html -->
  </div>
  <!-- /page-content -->
  <script>
   (function() {
			var timer;
			function openTimer(target) {
				target.trigger('mouseenter.megaDropdown');
			}
			function openMegaDropdown(t) {
				var $target = t.currentTarget ? $(this) : $(t);
				var $menu = $target.siblings('.mega-dropdown-menu');
				var isOpen = $target.parent().hasClass('md-open');
				var isClosing = $target.parent().hasClass('closing');
				if (isClosing) {
					setTimeout(openTimer, 130, $target);
					return;
				} else if (isOpen) {
					clearTimeout(timer);
					timer = undefined;
					return;
				} else {
					$menu.find('.logo, .description, .dropdown-separator').fadeIn(80);
					$menu.show().animate({top: 60, opacity: 1}, 120);
					$target.parent().addClass('md-open');
				}
			}
			function closeMegaDropdown() {
				$(this).addClass('closing');
				timer = setTimeout(closeTimer, 50, $(this));
			}
			function closeTimer(context) {
				context.find('.logo, .description').fadeOut(80);
				context.find('.mega-dropdown-menu').animate({top: 40, opacity: 0}, 120).hide(100,function() {
					$(this).closest('.mega-dropdown').removeClass('md-open closing');
				});
			}
			function positionDropdown(menu) {
				var $menu = menu.css({'visibility': 'hidden', 'display': 'block', 'position': 'absolute'});
				$menu.each(function() {
					$(this).removeClass('left right').addClass('center');
					($(this).offset().left + $(this).outerWidth()) > $(window).width() && $(this).removeClass('center').addClass('right');
					$(this).offset().left < 0 && element.removeClass('center').addClass('left');
					return $(this).css({'visibility': '', 'display': '', 'position': ''});
				});
			}

			function initMega() {
				if ($(window).width() > 991) {
					if ($('.mega-dropdown-menu').length) {
						positionDropdown($('.mega-dropdown-menu'));
						return;
					}
					$('.mega-dropdown .dropdown-toggle').on('mouseenter.megaDropdown', openMegaDropdown);
					$('.mega-dropdown').on('mouseleave.megaDropdown', closeMegaDropdown);
					$('.mega-dropdown').append(function() {
						return $(this).find('.dropdown-menu').clone(true).addClass('mega-dropdown-menu center').removeClass('dropdown-menu');
					});
					positionDropdown($('.mega-dropdown-menu'));
				} else {
					$('.mega-dropdown-menu').remove();
					$('.mega-dropdown, .mega-dropdown .dropdown-toggle').off('.megaDropdown');
				}
			}
			initMega()
			$(window).on('resize', initMega)


		})();
		// fade nav links on hover.  can't be done with css since the effect shouldn't
		// hapen when hovering on btns in the nav, ie the start a free trial button
		$(document).ready(function() {
			// $('.topnav .menu-item, .nav-trial .menu-item').hover(function() {
				// $(this).parent().toggleClass('partial-fade-out');
			// });
			$('.topnav .menu-item, .nav-trial .menu-item').on({
				mouseenter: function() {
					$(this).parent().addClass('partial-fade-out');
				},
				mouseleave: function() {
					$(this).parent().removeClass('partial-fade-out');
				}
			});
		})
  </script>
  <script>
   // Remove navbar-lg class from header for mobile devices
			// Media query event handler
			if (matchMedia) {
				var mq = window.matchMedia("(min-width: 992px)"); // this number needs to match the $grid-float-breakpoint value.
				mq.addListener(WidthChange);
				WidthChange(mq);
			}

			// Media query change
			function WidthChange(mq) {
				var fullbleed = false;
				
				if (mq.matches) {
					$('nav.navbar').addClass('navbar-lg');
					if (fullbleed) {
						$('nav.navbar').removeClass('navbar-dark').addClass('navbar-default');
					} else {
						$('nav.navbar').addClass('navbar-dark');
					}
				}
				else {
					$('nav.navbar').removeClass('navbar-lg').removeClass('navbar-default').addClass('navbar-dark');
				}
			};

			// horizontal subnav pattern
			$(document).ready(function() {
				var $window = $(window);
				var $checkNav = $('.subnav li.on');
				var $nav = $('.subnav');

				if ($checkNav.length === 0) {
					return;
				}

				var $on = $('li.on');
				var $onPosition = $on.position().left;
				var liGradient = '<li class="subnav-gradient"></li>';
				var scrollWidth = $nav[0].scrollWidth;
				var gradientBuffer = 1;

				function aggregateWidth() {
					return $nav.scrollLeft() + $('li.on').width();
				}
				function distanceRight() {
					return scrollWidth - $nav.scrollLeft() - $nav.width();
				}
				function clearGradient() {
					if ($nav.scrollLeft() === 0) {
						$nav.find('li').first().addClass('clearGradient');
					} else if (distanceRight() < gradientBuffer) {
						$nav.find('li').last().addClass('clearGradient');
					}
				}
				function detectEdge() {
					if ( $nav.scrollLeft() === 0 || distanceRight() < gradientBuffer ) {
						return clearGradient();
					} else {
						if ($('.subnav-gradient').hasClass('clearGradient')) {
							return $('.subnav-gradient').removeClass('clearGradient');
						}
					}
				}

				function setNavWidth() {
					var containerWidth = $('.container.logo-and-nav').width();
					if ($nav.width() < scrollWidth) {
						$nav.addClass('full-width');
					} else if (scrollWidth <= containerWidth) {
						$nav.removeClass('full-width');
					}
				}
				$window.on('resize', setNavWidth);
				setNavWidth();

				$nav.append(liGradient).prepend(liGradient);

				if ($window.width() - $onPosition < 0) {
					$nav.scrollLeft(($onPosition - 50));
				}
				if ($onPosition + $on.width() - $nav.width() < 50) {
					$nav.scrollLeft(($onPosition - 50));
				}
				$nav.scroll(function() {
					detectEdge();
				});
				detectEdge();
			});

			// Dropdown on hover and clickable nav item
			jQuery(function($) {
				if (mq.matches) {
					$('.navbar .dropdown').hover(function() {
							$(this).addClass('open').find('.dropdown-menu').first().stop(true, true).show();
					}, function() {
							$(this).removeClass('open').find('.dropdown-menu').first().stop(true, true).hide();
					});
					$('.navbar .dropdown > a').click(function(){
							location.href = this.href;
					});
				}
			});

			// Slide out navigation for mobile devices
			$(document).ready(function () {
					//stick in the fixed 100% height behind the navbar but don't wrap it
					$('#slide-nav.navbar .container').append($('<div id="navbar-height-col"></div>'));

					// Enter your ids or classes
					var toggler = '.navbar-toggle';
					var pagewrapper = '#page-content';
					var navigationwrapper = '.navbar-header';
					var menuwidth = '100%'; // the menu inside the slide menu itself
					var slidewidth = '60%';
					var menuneg = '-100%';
					var slideneg = '-60%';

					$("#slide-nav").on("click", toggler, function (e) {
							var selected = $(this).hasClass('slide-active');
							$(this).toggleClass('slide-active', !selected);
							$('#slidemenu').toggleClass('slide-active');
							$('#page-content, .navbar, body, .navbar-header').toggleClass('slide-active');
					});

					var selected = '#slidemenu, #page-content, body, .navbar, .navbar-header';

					$(window).on("resize", function () {
							if ($(window).width() > 931 && $('.navbar-toggle').is(':hidden')) {
									$(selected).removeClass('slide-active');
							}
					});
			});

			// Wrap .table-docs with a div to make it responsive
			$(document).ready(function () {
				$( ".table-docs" ).wrap( "<div class='table-responsive'></div>" );
			});

			// Forcing the jQuery UI widget used for login to close (page refreshes) when 'close' btn is clicked
			$(document).on("click", ".ui-dialog-titlebar-close", function(){
					location.reload(true);
			});


			// Fixed nav
			$(document).ready(function() {
				$(window).scroll(function () {
					if ($(window).scrollTop() > 290) {
						$('.nav-trial').addClass('showmethenav');
					}
					if ($(window).scrollTop() < 291) {
						$('.nav-trial').removeClass('showmethenav');
					}
				});
			});
  </script>
  <script src="https://3dna.nationbuilder.com/themes/24/58cbedc8cd0af55a03000000/0/attachments/14955746291615999939/default/bootstrap.min.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   function valueCheckInit() {
				var $text = $(".float-label input, .float-label select, .float-label textarea");

				$text.each(function(){
					var isSelect = $(this).is("select");
					if ($(this).val() !== "" && !isSelect) {
						$(this).attr("data-val", "true").siblings("label").addClass("float-auto");
					} else if ($(this).val() !== null && isSelect) {
						$(this).attr("data-val", "true").siblings("label").addClass("float-auto");
					}
				});
			}
			function valueCheck(e) {
				if (e.val() !== "") {
					e.attr("data-val", "true").siblings("label").addClass("float-true").removeClass("select-false float-auto").fadeIn(700);
				} else {
					e.attr("data-val", "false").siblings("label").removeClass("float-true float-auto").addClass("select-false").fadeOut(200);
				}
			}

			valueCheckInit();

			$(".float-label input").keyup(function(){
			  var e = $(this);
			  valueCheck(e);
			});

			$(".float-label select").change(function() {
			  var e = $(this);
			  valueCheck(e);
			}).focus(function(){
			  $(this).closest(".select-group")
			    .addClass("select-focus");
			}).focusout(function(){
			  $(this).closest(".select-group").removeClass("select-focus");
			});

			$(".float-label textarea").keyup(function() {
			  var e = $(this);
				var $floatLabel = $(this).siblings(".float-true");
				var labelHeight = $floatLabel.outerHeight() - 10;
				function check() {
					return e.scrollTop() > labelHeight && $floatLabel.hasClass("float-true");
				}
				if (check()) {
					return
				} else {
					valueCheck(e);
				}
			}).focus(function(){
			  $(this).closest(".textarea-group").addClass("textarea-focus");
			}).focusout(function(){
			  $(this).closest(".textarea-group").removeClass("textarea-focus");
			}).scroll(function(){
				var $floatLabel = $(this).siblings(".float-true");
				var labelHeight = $floatLabel.outerHeight() - 10;

				if ($(this).scrollTop() > labelHeight) {
					$floatLabel.fadeOut(300);
				} else {
					$floatLabel.fadeIn(100);
				}
			});
  </script>
  <!-- Segment snippet -->
  <script>
   !function(){var analytics=window.analytics=window.analytics||[];if(!analytics.initialize)if(analytics.invoked)window.console&&console.error&&console.error("Segment snippet included twice.");else{analytics.invoked=!0;analytics.methods=["trackSubmit","trackClick","trackLink","trackForm","pageview","identify","reset","group","track","ready","alias","debug","page","once","off","on","addSourceMiddleware","addIntegrationMiddleware","setAnonymousId","addDestinationMiddleware"];analytics.factory=function(e){return function(){var t=Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);t.unshift(e);analytics.push(t);return analytics}};for(var e=0;e<analytics.methods.length;e++){var key=analytics.methods[e];analytics[key]=analytics.factory(key)}analytics.load=function(key,e){var t=document.createElement("script");t.type="text/javascript";t.async=!0;t.src="https://cdn.segment.com/analytics.js/v1/" + key + "/analytics.min.js";var n=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];n.parentNode.insertBefore(t,n);analytics._loadOptions=e};analytics.SNIPPET_VERSION="4.13.1";
				analytics.load("QJycO5o3zo1nZderNF9kfPqeTyN35O4z");
				analytics.page("V9", {
					page_id: "46075",
					page_type: "Signup",
					author: "Alex Carpenter",
					page_parent: "",
					page_depth: "0",
					published_at: "2021-02-10 11:48:26 -0800",
					page_excerpt: "Software designed to power your organizations, movements, and campaigns."
				});
				var DMW1 = function({ payload, integration, next }) {
					if (payload.type() != 'identify') {
						next(payload);
					}
				};
				analytics.addDestinationMiddleware('Intercom', [DMW1]);
			}}();
  </script>
  <!-- End Segment snippet -->
  <script>
   !(function() {
				if (!String.prototype.includes) {
					String.prototype.includes = function(search, start) {
						if (search instanceof RegExp) {
							throw TypeError('first argument must not be a RegExp');
						}
						if (start === undefined) { start = 0; }
						return this.indexOf(search, start) !== -1;
					};
				}
				analytics.ready(function() {
					var prevRole = localStorage.getItem("ajs_user_traits")
						? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("ajs_user_traits")).role
						: null;
					var role = "visitor";
					if (prevRole) {
						role = prevRole;
					}
					function fireIdentify(id) {
						analytics.identify({
							role: role
						},	{
							context: {
								externalIds: [
									{
										id: id,
										type: "intercom_visitor_id",
										collection: "users",
										encoding: "none"
									}
								]
							}
						}, {
							integrations: {
								'Intercom': false
							}
						});
					}
					var visitorId = null;
					var visitorLoopIteration = 0;
					var isUser = localStorage.getItem("ajs_user_id");
					if (!isUser.includes('null')) {
						return;
					}
					var visitorIdInterval = setInterval(function() {
						visitorLoopIteration++;
						visitorId = window.Intercom("getVisitorId");
						if (visitorLoopIteration > 600) {
							clearInterval(visitorIdInterval);
						}
						if (visitorId) {
							fireIdentify(visitorId);
							clearInterval(visitorIdInterval);
						}
					}, 100);
				});
			})();
  </script>
  <!-- inline staff docs -->
  <script>
   if ( window.self !== window.top ) {
      var referrer_origin = "";
      if ( window.location.origin !== referrer_origin ) {
        var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
        var params = "iframe_req_path=" + window.location.pathname + "&referrer_origin=" + referrer_origin;
        xhttp.open("GET", "iframe_requests?" + params, true);
        xhttp.send();
      }
    }
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
